mapper.sql: select distinct requestResponse.role_id, requestResponse.role_name, requestResponse.role_key, requestResponse.role_sort, requestResponse.data_scope, requestResponse.menu_check_strictly, requestResponse.dept_check_strictly, requestResponse.status, requestResponse.del_flag, requestResponse.create_time, requestResponse.remark from sys_role requestResponse left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = requestResponse.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
mapper.select: select requestResponse.role_id, requestResponse.role_name, requestResponse.role_key, requestResponse.role_sort, requestResponse.data_scope, requestResponse.status from sys_role requestResponse WHERE requestResponse.del_flag = '0' and requestResponse.role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})
